languages.text: {n}Столы ломятся от пышущих жаром, истекающих жиром и дразнящих острыми ароматами яств. Настоящий вызов для неискушенного желудка, но {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вам доводилось{/d} участвовать в пирах куда более обильных.{/n}

{n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Столы ломятся от пышущих жаром, истекающих жиром и дразнящих острыми ароматами яств. Настоящий вызов для неискушенного желудка, но {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вам доводилось{/d} участвовать в пирах куда более обильных.{/n}

{n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}

languages.text: {n}餐桌上摆满了热气腾腾的美味佳肴，油脂都熬了出来，散发着诱人的辛辣香味。对于没参加过盛宴的人而言，这恐怕会是相当困难的挑战，但对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}你{/d}而言不值一提，毕竟比这丰盛得多的宴会你都参加过。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}餐桌上摆满了热气腾腾的美味佳肴，油脂都熬了出来，散发着诱人的辛辣香味。对于没参加过盛宴的人而言，这恐怕会是相当困难的挑战，但对{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}你{/d}而言不值一提，毕竟比这丰盛得多的宴会你都参加过。{/n}

languages.text: {n}テーブルは熱い料理でいっぱいになり、脂をしたらせ、そそるような香辛料の香りを放っている。慣れていない胃にはなかなかの挑戦だが、これよりもはるかに豪華な宴に参加したことがある{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}あなた{/d}にとっては大したことではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}テーブルは熱い料理でいっぱいになり、脂をしたらせ、そそるような香辛料の香りを放っている。慣れていない胃にはなかなかの挑戦だが、これよりもはるかに豪華な宴に参加したことがある{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}あなた{/d}にとっては大したことではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las mesas se comban bajo el repertorio de platos humeantes, que rezuman grasa y despiden aromas deliciosamente especiados. Todo un reto para un estómago no acostumbrado, pero {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}tú{/d} has disfrutado de banquetes mucho más fastuosos que este.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mesas se comban bajo el repertorio de platos humeantes, que rezuman grasa y despiden aromas deliciosamente especiados. Todo un reto para un estómago no acostumbrado, pero {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}tú{/d} has disfrutado de banquetes mucho más fastuosos que este.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Tische biegen sich unter der Masse dampfend heißer Gerichte voller Fett, die verlockend würzige Aromen absondern. Eine Herausforderung für den ungeübten Magen, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}du{/d} hast schon an deutlich größeren Festmahlen teilgenommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Tische biegen sich unter der Masse dampfend heißer Gerichte voller Fett, die verlockend würzige Aromen absondern. Eine Herausforderung für den ungeübten Magen, aber {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}du{/d} hast schon an deutlich größeren Festmahlen teilgenommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Masalar, buram buram yağ akan ve cezbedici baharat kokuları yayan dumanı üstünde yemeklerin ağırlığına âdeta meydan okuyor. Gördüklerin alışkın olmayan bir mide için zorlayıcı bir sınav niteliğinde olsa da {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}sen{/d}, bundan çok daha görkemli yemeklere katılmış birisin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Masalar, buram buram yağ akan ve cezbedici baharat kokuları yayan dumanı üstünde yemeklerin ağırlığına âdeta meydan okuyor. Gördüklerin, alışkın olmayan bir mide için zorlayıcı bir sınav niteliğinde olsa da {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}sen{/d} bundan çok daha görkemli yemeklere katılmış birisin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les tables croulent sous des monceaux de plats fumants et dégoulinants de graisse, exhalant des arômes épicés des plus alléchants. Un défi de taille pour les estomacs non-initiés, mais {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}vous{/d} avez déjà participé à des orgies autrement plus fastueuses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The tables are buckling under the spread of steaming hot dishes, oozing with grease and exuding tantalisingly spicy aromas. Quite the challenge for an uninitiated stomach, but {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} have taken part in feasts far grander than this.{/n}
